title: fabber_dce
description: Fabber DCE analysis tool for model-based analysis of dynamic contrast-enhanced imaging data.

list_params.title: List Model Parameters
list_params.description: List model parameters (requires model configuration options to be given)

describe_params.title: Describe Model Parameters
describe_params.description: Describe model parameters (name, description, units) - requires model configuration options to be given

list_outputs.title: List Additional Outputs
list_outputs.description: List additional model outputs (requires model configuration options to be given)

evaluate_model.title: Evaluate Model
evaluate_model.description: Evaluate model. Set to name of output required or blank for default output. Requires model configuration options, --evaluate-params and --evaluate-nt

evaluate_params.title: Evaluation Parameters
evaluate_params.description: List of parameter values for evaluation

evaluate_nt.title: Evaluation Time Points
evaluate_nt.description: Number of time points for evaluation - must be consistent with model options where appropriate

simple_output.title: Simple Output
simple_output.description: Instead of usual output, simply output series of lines each giving progress as percentage

overwrite.title: Overwrite Existing Output
overwrite.description: If set will overwrite existing output. If not set, new output directories will be created by appending '+' to the directory name

link_to_latest.title: Link To Latest Output Directory
link_to_latest.description: Try to create a link to the most recent output directory with the prefix _latest

load_models.title: Load Models
load_models.description: Load models dynamically from the specified filename, which should be a DLL/shared library

multiple_data.title: Multiple Data Files
multiple_data.description: Specify multiple data files for n=1, 2, 3...

data_order.title: Data Order
data_order.description: If multiple data files are specified, how they will be handled: concatenate = one after the other, interleave = first record from each file, then second, etc.

mask.title: Mask File
mask.description: Mask file. Inference will only be performed where mask value > 0

masked_time_points.title: Masked Time Points
masked_time_points.description: List of masked time points, indexed from 1. These will be ignored in the parameter updates

supplemental_data.title: Supplemental Data
supplemental_data.description: 'Supplemental' timeseries data, required for some models

dump_param_names.title: Dump Parameter Names
dump_param_names.description: Write the file paramnames.txt containing the names of the model parameters

save_model_fit.title: Save Model Fit
save_model_fit.description: Output the model prediction as a 4D volume

save_residuals.title: Save Residuals
save_residuals.description: Output the residuals (difference between the data and the model prediction)

save_model_extras.title: Save Model Extras
save_model_extras.description: Output any additional model-specific timeseries data

save_noise_mean.title: Save Noise Means
save_noise_mean.description: Output the noise means. The noise distribution inferred is the precision of a Gaussian noise source.

save_free_energy.title: Save Free Energy
save_free_energy.description: Output the free energy, if calculated.

option_file.title: Option File
option_file.description: File containing additional options, one per line, in the same form as specified on the command line

debug.title: Debug Flag
debug.description: Output large amounts of debug information. ONLY USE WITH VERY SMALL NUMBERS OF VOXELS
